name: Office Hellspace
description:
You wake up. You're in Hell...yet it looks strangely like your 9-5 office job. Climb your way to the top of Hell Tower defeating interns, HR, managers, and the CEO himself: The Devil. Everyone keeps telling you this isn't real, you're in a game. But you know that's not true. Can you make it out alive?

"Office Hellspace" is a roguelike where you must battle your disgruntled co-workers to climb out of your own personal Hell. The game is available for Windows and MacOS (Linux coming soon). Dungeons are randomly generated so the game has maximum replayability. Get lost for hours or just a few minutes at a time. Your player will be waiting for you when you return.

How high can you climb?
